sourceDesc.p: The contents of this document are generated from SOSOL.

revisionDesc.change: Entered by hand (not transcoded text) from ed. pr., with Eng. trans (slightly emended). I renamed Frags A and B to 1 and 2 as per Leiden+ help. I corrected 1 typo and 1 reading from the plate in Frag. 1 (perhaps I do not need to mark corrections of typos? Please advise for the future.). I am not sure that I entered the uncertain restorations in Frag. 2 correctly, or at least the preview left me in doubt as to whether or not I did. The macron over the omega in Frag. 2 is not definitely a number (or the ed. is uncertain), and it looks odd: I might have not entered it correctly.

div.p: ... once more later ... since all the people of the Apollonopolite and Lykopolite (nomes) and of Hypsele devote themselves to murders and driving away (animals) ...
... truth ... in order that the case be revised ... them to be called before the judge and to investigate ... went off from (?) Lykopolis together with the dux(?) ...
